title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing does not appear.  The actual result is that there is no list of child nodes displayed.  This behavior can be reproduced by performing the following steps: 1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement.  2. The new data source should have no database, table, or column information. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
